messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Shas Sheehan
messages.content: Shas will be the independent voice speaking up for Wimbledon, Morden, Raynes Park and Motspur Park in Parliament. Shas will continue to fight to save services at St Helier Hospital and to ensure our NHS needs to guarantee mental health equality. Shas' track record of working with the local community to reclaim our roads, secure our services and fight for a local and national economy that gives opportunities for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to save services at St Helier Hospital and to guarantee mental health equality.
Work with the local community to reclaim our roads and secure our services.
Fight for a local and national economy that gives opportunities for all.
